description:
As a developer
  I want to test the complete flow from Commercetools webhook to Segment user creation/update
  So that I can verify the integration works correctly end-to-end

elements.name: Complete flow for customer.created event creates user in Segment

steps.name: the webhook endpoint is available at "/api/webhook"
the Segment integration is configured with valid credentials
the data transformation service is available
a valid Commercetools customer.created webhook payload with:
I send the webhook payload to the webhook endpoint

result.error_message:
Error: Failed to send webhook request: fetch failed
    at World.<anonymous> (/Users/joern/work/commercetools-to-segment/tests/steps/story-5-end-to-end-integration.steps.ts:223:11)
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:105:5)

steps.name: the webhook endpoint should return HTTP status 200
the customer should be created in Segment with userId "newuser@example.com"
the customer in Segment should have email "newuser@example.com" in traits
the customer in Segment should have name "John Doe" in traits
the customer in Segment should have address in traits:
